meanings.definition: Make as large or great as possible.
meanings.sent1: I will try to maximize the space in my room by organizing better.
meanings.sent2: She wanted to maximize her savings by finding the best deals.
meanings.sent3: Trying to maximize the number of cookies in the jar led to a comical mess.
meanings.sent4: His ambition was to maximize his potential like a flower reaching for the sun.
meanings.sent5: The coach's advice was to maximize every opportunity on the field.

meanings.sent1: To maximize the study session, she focused on the most important topics.
meanings.sent2: He knew he had to maximize his time at the library to finish his project.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to maximize the acorn by burying it in multiple spots.
meanings.sent4: She aimed to maximize her skills like a chef perfecting a recipe.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is to maximize your strengths and work on your weaknesses.

meanings.sent1: They wanted to maximize their vacation by visiting all the attractions.
meanings.sent2: He tried to maximize his chances of winning by practicing every day.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to maximize the trick by adding more rabbits to the hat.
meanings.sent4: She aimed to maximize her happiness like a gardener nurturing a plant.
meanings.sent5: The team needed to maximize their teamwork to achieve victory.
